alert.note: Alert for Collingsworth; Donley; Gray; Hemphill; Wheeler (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 13 at 4:57PM CDT until August 13 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 PM CDT FOR WHEELER...SOUTHEASTERN GRAY...NORTHERN COLLINGSWORTH... SOUTHEASTERN HEMPHILL AND NORTHEASTERN DONLEY COUNTIES... At 457 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles northeast of Wheeler to 11 miles northwest of Quail, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Locations impacted include... Shamrock, Briscoe, Wheeler, Mclean, Lutie, Twitty, Allison, Dozier, Lela, Samnorwood, and Kellerville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
